title: REVERSE MODE
body: its pretty simple swap the scaling of all champs ability's from AP to AD, AD to AP same with armor scaling ability's armor to magic resist hp to mana i think it would be easy to do and a lot of fun i think it would be awesome and if people don't like it  don't play it just like all the other modes. i think it would bring some life back into the game most of the  "featured"  game modes  are bland and boring king poro mode i mean come on. in my opinion i think that the only fun featured modes are black market brawlers and URF

You know what despite all the comments i'm feeling this

Wait... so what happens to Akali.

Let me do the math:

* She gets ability-burst from building straight AD, check.
* She gets even more horrifying amounts of passive spell vamp on all ability-damage because she's building straight ad, check.
* She gets a boatload of lifesteal on auto-attacks too, because, oh right, she's building straight ad.
* She gets bonus magic damage on her auto-attacks that is a percent of her max ad... ... and that percent now scales with ad, check.

Yep, that's the recipe for the apocaLoLypse.

Rito, make this game mode. I don't have enough reasons these days to go huddle in a corner and cry in fear.

EDIT: Oh, one mistake, that passive spellvamp now scales with ap, not ad. Crisis sort of averted... ... WELL SCREW THAT, LEAVE THAT PART ALONE. IT'S NOT HILARIOUS ENOUGH OTHERWISE.
